Author: richardt#2807
Content: Trying to run ocean wallet for the first time on Mac OS and getting "Error: Cannot parse configuration file:  Missing komodo.conf.  Only use key=value syntax".  Could someone please help?

Author: richardt#2807
Content: Using the latest version v2.0.15-rc2-g28-3

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content:
Before you start create the following configuration file, named komodo.conf in  cd ~/Library/Application\ Support/Komodo folder:

rpcuser=bitcoinrpc
rpcpassword=password
txindex=1
addnode=5.9.102.210
addnode=78.47.196.146
addnode=178.63.69.164
addnode=88.198.65.74
addnode=5.9.122.241
addnode=144.76.94.38
addnode=89.248.166.91

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: Change rpc user and pass to something more secure

Author: ComputerGenie 游놊游낖游닉#7004
Content: or just put the one provided in the download there

Author: richardt#2807
Content: Got it.  Thanks guys!
